text: aur un mein baaz (aise bhi hai ke) teri taraf kaan lagaate hai, yahaa tak ke jab tere paas se jaate hai, to ahle ilm se (ba wajeh kondh zehni wa la-parvaahi ke) puchte hai ke us ne abhi kya kaha tha? yahi log hai jin ke dilo par Allah ne muhar kardi hai aur wo apni qaahisho ki pairvi karte hai
